title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to interact with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with model management, chats and plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for easier scripting.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that adds Copilot-like code completion powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Experimental gRPC proxy in front of Ollama for high-performance streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that connects to Ollama for local LLM conversations.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses Ollama models to summarize notes and answer vault questions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams responses from Ollama models in chat channels.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama with Finch/Tesla clients and GenServer helpers.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama models in mobile and desktop apps.
